799710.name: Algo Bot - Original Soundtrack
799710.description:
The official original soundtrack for Algo Bot:

  • 01 - The Control Room
  • 02 - ATV Europa
  • 03 - PAL
  • 04 - Overboard
  • 05 - Carried Away
  • 06 - Instability
  • 07 - High Maintenance
  • 08 - Detour
  • 09 - Double Trouble
  • 10 - Terminal situation
  • 11 - A Non-Trivial Matter
  • 12 - A Break Point
  • 13 - Binary 101
  • 14 - Packing Algorithms
  • 15 - By The Numbers
  • 16 - Terminal Velocity
  • 17 - A Hopeless Case
  • 18 - Grounded(Bonus Track)
  • 19 - ATV To The White Dwarf(Bonus Track)
799710.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
